vocabulary.example: Please check your schedule for the meeting.
The deadline for submitting the report is Friday.
I have an appointment with the doctor at 3 PM.
The customer is always right.
The company hired ten new employees.
I'll be in the office until 6 PM.
We are working on a new marketing project.
Please send me the quarterly report.
We need to review the budget for next year.
Let's schedule a meeting to discuss the issue.
The negotiation lasted for three hours.
We submitted a proposal for the new contract.
Please sign the contract by Friday.
The company's revenue increased by 20%.
Our main competitor launched a similar product.
We need a new marketing strategy.
We established a strategic partnership with them.
What's on the agenda for today's meeting?
Thank you for your feedback on the presentation.
Our main objective is to increase market share.
The company announced its acquisition of a rival firm.
The merger created the largest company in the industry.
Our subsidiary in Asia handles regional operations.
We need to consider all stakeholders' interests.
The department ensures compliance with regulations.
Shareholders will receive dividends next quarter.
We must protect our intellectual property rights.
The company underwent major restructuring.
The merger will create significant synergy.
We use industry benchmarks to measure performance.
